short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Casefox is legal billing software, timekeeping, software for lawyers,legal billing,expense tracking, time billing, trust accounting

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CaseFoxÂ® is an easy to use timekeeping and billing software for law firms, attorneys, accountants, investigators, consultants and other professionals. In addition to timekeeping and billing features, CaseFox also features rule based calendaring, task management, LEDES invoicing, partner-associate fee splitting rules, trust accounting, phone message logging, accounting ledger, discovery tracking, one-click invoicing, custom fields, conflict check, client portal, secure communication with clients and more... This app can be used in conjunction with Web App available at www.casefox.com. While Web App offers extensive feature set, basic timekeeping features are available through this app. More features will be added in future versions. *** This app is free. However, you will need to subscribe to a paid plan after Case/User limits of the basic plan are exceeded. Please login to your account at www.casefox.com to subscribe to a paid plan. Free basic plan comes with up to 4 cases and 2 users are free. ***
